sense.gloss: curse, divine punishment, wrath (of an angry spirit)
to curse, to cast a spell, to haunt, to torment
to cause a bad result, to bring about a negative outcome

k_ele.e: 触らぬ神にたたりなし

r_ele.r: さわらぬかみにたたりなし

sense.gloss: let sleeping dogs lie, wake not a sleeping lion, the spirit you do not approach will not curse you
to break down due to overwork, to try so hard that the situation gets worse

sdata.j: ↑弱↑↓よわ↓り↑目↑↓め↓に↑祟↑↓たた↓り↑目↑↓め↓。
↑触↑↓さわ↓らぬ↑神↑↓かみ↓に↑祟↑↓たた↓りなし。
↑駐禁↑↓ちゅうきん↓で↑切符↑↓きっぷ↓を↑切↑↓き↓られた↑直後↑↓ちょくご↓に↑Ｕ↑↓ゆー↓ターン↑禁止↑↓きんし↓でつかまった。↑運↑↓うん↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓いというか、↑弱↑↓よわ↓り↑目↑↓め↓に↑祟↑↓たた↓り↑目↑↓め↓というか。
sdata.e: It wasn't my lucky day. First, I got a parking ticket and then things went from bad to worse when I got pulled over for making a U-turn.

sdata.j: ↑触↑↓さわ↓らぬ↑神↑↓かみ↓に↑祟↑↓たた↓りなし。
sdata.e: Never trouble till trouble troubles you.

words.gloss: curse, divine punishment, wrath (of an angry spirit)
to curse, to cast a spell, to haunt, to torment
